Package model.general

Class Pawn

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.general.Pawn

  • public class Pawn
extends java.lang.Object
    Pawn's class

    The class Pawn is used to create a movable object from the board (a player or a crate).

    See Also:
    Type, Board, Case
